comment.author: 8554266@N07
comment._content: haha... Under Additional information; "Taken on May 23, 2008" ... Anyway: Cool picture. Strange to see ships like that. Seems like so many years ago..., but it's just one century...

comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: @Klskogen: One reason that ship looks so old is that it's a replica of one of the caravels that Columbus sailed on to America! (isn't that pretty small to cross the Atlantic on??) This photo closely resembles one on page 85 of Glimpses of the World's Fair, which names this caravel Santa Maria.
